name: places/ChIJy2v-BihawokRwrEeyi4ituk
adrFormatAddress: 81 Bowery, New York, NY 10002, USA

editorialSummary.text: Straightforward dorms & rooms in a pared-down hostel offering a communal kitchen.

originalText.text:
Let me be honest:
This place is not the Ritz Carlton. And you know it. It has got weak wifi, and a couple other little things that tend to mildly annoy people...
But, for the price that you pay it is a very nice place, with a good location and available hosts!

text.text:
Let me be honest:
This place is not the Ritz Carlton. And you know it. It has got weak wifi, and a couple other little things that tend to mildly annoy people...
But, for the price that you pay it is a very nice place, with a good location and available hosts!

originalText.text:
Nous avons séjourné dans cette auberge avec deux amis. Nous disposions d'un appartement partagé à quelques rues de l'auberge. L'emplacement est génial au pied du métro, et dessert tous les endroits de New York très rapidement.

Je pense que le rapport qualité prix est imbattable (870€ la semaine pour trois), toutefois à ce prix la ne vous attendez pas au grand luxe, la chambre est assez petite, un lit double et un lit superposé, il y a peu de places pour les valises, les espaces communs sont petits, juste une cuisine/entrée de moins de 10m² et une salle de bains ce qui est juste quand l'appartement est totalement occupé (8 personnes peuvent séjourner en même temps). Nous avons eu la chance d'être seuls 5 nuits sur 7 ce qui ne nous a donc pas gêné.

Les chambres ne sont pas propres le ménager n'a pas été fait de notre séjour et les poubelles n'ont pas été vidées depuis les précédents voyageurs...

Nous recommandons toutefois pour le petit budget, qui ne prêtent pas forcément attention à la propreté.

text.text:
We stayed at this hostel with two friends. We had a shared apartment a few blocks from the hostel. The location is great at the foot of the subway, and serves all places in New York very quickly.

I think the value for money is unbeatable (€870 per week for three), however at this price don't expect great luxury, the room is quite small, a double bed and a bunk bed, there are few places for suitcases, the common areas are small, just a kitchen/entrance of less than 10m² and a bathroom which is just right when the apartment is fully occupied (8 people can stay at the same time). We were lucky enough to be alone 5 nights out of 7 which didn't bother us.

The rooms are not clean, the cleaning was not done during our stay and the trash cans have not been emptied since the previous travelers...

However, we recommend it for those on a small budget, who do not necessarily pay attention to cleanliness.

originalText.text: Un hostal de baja calidad, aunque tiene un precio más bajo que la media, obviamente es lo que pagas, para dormir cumple, pero es bastante pequeño y no está muy bien cuidado.

text.text: A low quality hostel, although it has a lower price than the average, it is obviously what you pay for, it is good for sleeping, but it is quite small and not very well maintained.
